text: The Longest Yard (1974) is a comedy-drama movie starring Burt Reynolds, Eddie Albert, Enrique Pe√±a Nieto, and Bernadette Peters. It is about a football team of prison inmates which plays against a team of prison guards. ==References== Category:1974 drama movies Category:1970s comedy movies Category:English- language movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Aldrich
title: The Longest Yard
